advancements.tameablebeasts.argentavis.d: The agile Argentavis can be tame with Big Bird Bait when it is under 10 health.
advancements.tameablebeasts.asphalt.desc: Asphalt some dirt so Roly Polies can have a better grip and thus more speed.
advancements.tameablebeasts.beetle_armor: Giving Netherite A Run For Its Money
Upgrade and your Diamond Armor set to a full set of Beetle Gem Armor.
advancements.tameablebeasts.beetle_elytr: Fuse you Beetle Gem Chestplate with Elytra.
advancements.tameablebeasts.big_bird_bai: Combine Iron Nuggets, some seeds and Quetzal Meat or Rotten Flesh into the ultimate big bird lure.
advancements.tameablebeasts.big_iron_hoe: Give you Scarecrow Allay a Big Iron Hoe so it can defend itself better.
advancements.tameablebeasts.biker_helmet: Roly Polies will go faster if they are sure you are protected with a Poly Biker Helmet.
advancements.tameablebeasts.bird_bait_ar: Even better put some Big Bird Bait in arrows to try to tame some big birds without any health restrictions.
advancements.tameablebeasts.brush_a_beas: Was Specting Ticks This Is Far Better
Well fed beasts got a higher chance of dropping some loot when brushed.
advancements.tameablebeasts.bug_salad.de: Craft a Bug Salad, exquisite giant bug cuisine.
advancements.tameablebeasts.bug_sword.de: Craft a Bug Sword, while not stronger than an Iron Sword, it has potential for poisoning and bug summoning.
advancements.tameablebeasts.chikote.desc: The Chikotes, the tall cousins of the chickens submit under the sight of Big Bird Meat or Potatoes.
advancements.tameablebeasts.crested_geck: Now I Have To Build A Terrarium
Tame Crested Geckos by offering them some arthropod pieces.
advancements.tameablebeasts.egg_rests: Not Making An Omelette With This One
advancements.tameablebeasts.egg_rests.de: Loot some Egg Rests from eggs you bred or you found on nests.
advancements.tameablebeasts.flying_helme: Got A Bug In My Eye
Wear a Flying Helmet to protect your eyes so Quetzals won't limit their speed.
advancements.tameablebeasts.frozen_fish: Why is the fish not moving anymore?
Combine ice and fish into the ultimate teeth breaking snack.
advancements.tameablebeasts.fur_golem.de: Build a Fur Golem just as you would build an Ice Golem, but with fur, this gentle golem will keep you eggs warm.
advancements.tameablebeasts.gem_beetle.d: Combine different kinds of crystals and bug pieces to create Beetle Gem, a material that holds a power similar to Netherite.
advancements.tameablebeasts.grapteranodo: Ptera Meal when under 10 health is enough to tame the Grapteranodon, a fast pteranodon that can pick up other mobs.
Offer some salad to the Grasshoppers to tame them.
advancements.tameablebeasts.ground_beetl: Beetles in general got a huge sweet tooth for honey related items, so much they could get tamed.
advancements.tameablebeasts.ice_armor.de: Equip a Penguin a full set of Ice Amor and two Icepops (don't actually bring him a Warden).
advancements.tameablebeasts.metal_beetle: Feed enough Raw Iron to Ground Beetles for them to absorb their properties.
advancements.tameablebeasts.penguin.desc: It's a known fact that penguins love frozen fish to eat and popsicles to slaughter other beings. Right?
advancements.tameablebeasts.ptera_meal_a: Even better put some Pteranodon Meal in arrows to try to tame some pteras without any health restrictions.
advancements.tameablebeasts.pteranodon_m: You Sure You Want That Kind Of Attention?
Combine fish, Chicken and Big Bird Meat into the ultimate pretanodon lure.
advancements.tameablebeasts.purple_allay: Find the shy Purple Allay, a rare drop from illagers that will fly to hide in you inventory.
advancements.tameablebeasts.quetzal_stan: Equip a Quetzal Stand on a Quetzal so that you can fly with up to 3 friends!.
advancements.tameablebeasts.quetzalcoatl: Spot the ginormous Quetzalcoatlus and tame it with Ptera Meal when it is under 10 health.
advancements.tameablebeasts.racoon: Remember That Time You Stole My Food?
advancements.tameablebeasts.racoon.descr: Heard Racoons enjoy melon particularly, even more than whatever you got in your hand.
advancements.tameablebeasts.roly_poly.de: Tame a salad loving, usually rolling, fast moving Roly Poly.
advancements.tameablebeasts.root.descrip: Thanks for donwloading Tameable Beasts! Go tame some beasts.
advancements.tameablebeasts.scarecrow_al: A Scarecrow Block sounds like the perfect cover for the Purple Allays to roam confidently. Once you get it in it, interact with the Scarecrow Allay to tame it!
advancements.tameablebeasts.shiny_beetle: Beetles in general got a huge sweet tooth for honey related items, so much they could get tamed.
enchantment.tameablebeasts.sting.desc: Provides poisonous properties to the blade of the weapon.
enchantment.tameablebeasts.swarm.desc: Summons Beetle Drones in your aid either when defending or attacking depending on the type of item enchanted.
item.tameablebeasts.argentavis_egg.toolt: You can hatch a Argentavis from this, if you are a good parent.
item.tameablebeasts.asphalt.tooltip: Use it to build roads over dirt, roly polies get a better grip on these too.
item.tameablebeasts.beetle_egg.tooltip: You can hatch a Shiny Beetle from this, if you are a good parent.
item.tameablebeasts.big_bird_bait.toolti: Tame giant birds with this seedy treat.
item.tameablebeasts.biker_helmet.tooltip: Roly polies won't slow down for your safety with this.
item.tameablebeasts.bird_bait_arrow.tool: Deliver giant bird taming projectiles, careful not to kill them.
item.tameablebeasts.bug_sword.tooltip: Hides the power of hives and poison.
item.tameablebeasts.chikote_egg.tooltip: You can hatch a Chikote from this, if you are a good parent.
item.tameablebeasts.crested_gecko_egg.to: You can hatch a Crested Gecko from this, if you are a good parent.
item.tameablebeasts.egg_rests.tooltip: You are a bad parent, maybe you can make something bugs will like with it.
item.tameablebeasts.flying_helmet.toolti: Flying mobs won't slow down for your safety with this.
item.tameablebeasts.graptera_egg.tooltip: You can hatch a Grapteranodon from this, if you are a good parent.
item.tameablebeasts.grasshopper_egg.tool: You can hatch a Grasshopper from this, if you are a good parent.
item.tameablebeasts.grasshopper_leg.tool: Don't worry they instantly grow back.
item.tameablebeasts.ground_beetle_egg.to: You can hatch a Ground Beetle from this, if you are a good parent.
item.tameablebeasts.ice_chestplate.toolt: Equip it on penguins to ride them.
item.tameablebeasts.ice_helmet.tooltip: That won't fit on you maybe try on something smaller.
item.tameablebeasts.icepop.tooltip: Can be a tasty treat or a deadly penguin weapon.
item.tameablebeasts.iron_big_hoe.tooltip: Some scarecrow would give this a better use
item.tameablebeasts.penguin_egg.tooltip: You can hatch a Penguin from this, if you are a good parent.
item.tameablebeasts.ptera_meal_arrow.too: Deliver pteranodon taming projectiles, careful not to kill them.
item.tameablebeasts.pteranodon_meal.tool: Tame pteranodons with this ancient treat.
item.tameablebeasts.purple_allay.tooltip: Allay too shy to scape your inventory, maybe he could feel at home inside some disguise.
item.tameablebeasts.quetzal_stand.toolti: Equip it on quetzals to allow more players on them.
item.tameablebeasts.quetzalcoatlus_egg.t: You can hatch a Quetzal from this, if you are a good parent.
item.tameablebeasts.racoon_fur.tooltip: This is somehow as strong as spider strings.
item.tameablebeasts.racoon_fur_block.too: You could build a fur golem with these.
item.tameablebeasts.roly_plaque.tooltip: Soft chitin plaque, looks comfy to sit on or wear.
item.tameablebeasts.roly_poly_egg.toolti: You can hatch a Roly Poly from this, if you are a good parent.
item.tameablebeasts.scarecrow_block.tool: This will keep Chikotes at bay, seems kinda cozy inside too.
Wear it or build with it a scarecrow to defend your crops.
